ch_title: Water Funds: Coordinating Resources & Action For Watershed Improvement
name: Water Funds locations
summary: These include both operational and pre-operational Water Funds tracked by The Nature Conservancy. The ones labeled in purple correspond to the examples highlighted in this chapter.

name: CRP ( Conservation Reserve Program )
summary: Farmers whose land-use decisions and management practices affect water quality, soil loss and wildlife habitat are the ecosystem service suppliers. Eligible farmers who choose to enroll in CRP are compensated.
